Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.builders

Class EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.builders.AbstractWritableAttributesBuilder<EntityPropertyDescriptor>
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.config.builders.EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntityPropertyRegistryBuilder.PropertyDescriptorBuilder
public class EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder extends AbstractWritableAttributesBuilder<EntityPropertyDescriptor>
Builder for a configuring a single SimpleEntityPropertyDescriptor. The builder can also be applied to any existing MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

  • Constructor Details

    • EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder

      public EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder(@NonNull @NonNull String name)
      Create a new builder for the entity property with the given name. The name of the property should be unique within the registry, and cannot be changed afterwards.
      Parameters:
      name - of the property

  • Method Details

    • original

      public EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder original(EntityPropertyDescriptor original)
      Set the original descriptor that the new one is shadowing. If set, all properties from the original will be inherited unless explicitly configured.
      Parameters:
      original - descriptor
      Returns:
      current builder

    • parent

      public EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder parent(EntityPropertyDescriptor parent)
      Set a parent descriptor for this property. This turns the new descriptor into a nested property, expected to be a child of the object that the parent property represents.

      When setting a parent descriptor, you may consider setting a EntityAttributes.TARGET_DESCRIPTOR value as well referring to the original leaf descriptor that was the basis for a nested combination.

      Parameters:
      parent - descriptor
      Returns:
      current builder

    • propertyType

      public EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder propertyType(Class<?> propertyType)
      Set the simple property type of the descriptor. Favour propertyType(TypeDescriptor) instead.
      Parameters:
      propertyType - class of the property value
      Returns:
      current builder

    • propertyType

      public EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder propertyType(org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor typeDescriptor)
      Sets the full type descriptor for this property.
      Parameters:
      typeDescriptor - instance for the property value
      Returns:
      current builder

    • viewElementPostProcessor

      public <U extends com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElement> EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder viewElementPostProcessor(ViewElementMode mode, com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementPostProcessor<U> viewElementPostProcessor)
      Add a ViewElementPostProcessor to apply to the default ViewElementBuilder. Note that postprocessor will be ignored if a custom ViewElementBuilder was set using viewElementBuilder(ViewElementMode, ViewElementBuilder).
      Parameters:

      Returns:
